author: Flywheel

bids_app_command.description: The command as supplied to the BIDS app e.g., qsiprep bids_dir output_dir participant [arg1 [arg2 ...]]

gear-dry-run.description: Do everything except actually execute BIDS App command

gear-intermediate-files.description: Space separated list of FILES to retain from the intermediate work directory.

gear-intermediate-folders.description: Space separated list of FOLDERS to retain from the intermediate work directory.

gear-keep-output.description: Don't delete output.  Output is always zipped into a single file for easy download.  Choose this option to prevent output deletion after zipping.

gear-save-intermediate-output.description: Gear will save ALL intermediate output into {{bids_app_binary}}_work.zip

mem_mb.description: Maximum memory to use (MB). Leave blank or set to 0 to use the maximum available in the system.

n_cpus.description: Number of CPUs/cores to use. Leave blank or set to 0 to use the maximum available in the system.

dependencies.name: Other
dependencies.url: REPLACE: url of the packages the BIDS app uses

description: REPLACE: Use this template to build Flywheel gears that wrap official BIDS App algorithms. Replace the name of the binary, description, licenses, and any other fields. Limit adding to the config fields as much as possible to leverage the methods in the flywheel_bids_app_toolkit and this template.

archived_runs.description: Zip file with data or analyses from previous runs (e.g., FreeSurfer archive)
